description.value:
Prerequisite(s): Three Brutal Crocodile Maneuvers
Range: Melee, see text
Target: See text
Duration: Instant

Description

Discipline: Brutal Crocodile (Strike) Lunging from the ground at high speed, you slam your target into the dirt, injuring any unfortunate enough to stand in the way. You must be grappling a creature to initiate this maneuver. Make a charge attack against a creature within charge range of you, ignoring any difficult terrain between you. This attack deals [[10d10]] damage to the target as well as the grappled creature on a successful hit. In addition, any creatures within 15 feet of where you end your charge take [[2d10]] damage (Reflex save for half, DC 17 + your initiation modifier).
